attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2014-1383

Date: 2014-12-11

The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advises that each of the following persons be appointed one of Her Majesty’s Counsel learned in the law and that a Commission be issued to him or her:

 

(a)  Robert Frater, Senior General Counsel, Office of the Assistant Deputy Attorney General, Department of Justice;

 

(b)  Colonel Vihar Joshi, Deputy Judge Advocate General, Administrative Law, Department of National Defence;

 

(c)  Guy Laurin, Senior General Counsel, Legislative Services Branch, Department of Justice;

 

(d)  Liliana Longo, Senior General Counsel, Legal Services of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police, Department of Justice;

 

(e)  Croft Michaelson, Senior General Counsel, Ontario Regional Office (Toronto), Public Prosecution Service of Canada;

 

(f)  William F. Pentney, Deputy Minister of Justice and Deputy Attorney General of Canada, Department of Justice; and

 

(g)  Dale Yurka, General Counsel, Ontario Regional Office (Toronto), Department of Justice.

 


Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé, recommande que les personnes dont le nom figure ci-après soient nommées conseillers juridiques de Sa Majesté et qu’une commission leur soit délivrée à cet effet :

 

a)  Robert Frater, avocat général principal, Bureau du sous-procureur général adjoint, ministère de la Justice;

 

b)  le colonel Vihar Joshi, juge-avocat général adjoint, Droit administratif, ministère de la Défense nationale;

 

c)  Guy Laurin, avocat général principal, Direction des services législatifs, ministère de la Justice;

 

d)  Liliana Longo, avocate générale principale, Services juridiques de la Gendarmerie royale du Canada, ministère de la Justice;

 

e)  Croft Michaelson, avocat général principal, Bureau régional de l’Ontario (Toronto), Service des poursuites pénales du Canada;

 

f)  William F. Pentney, sous-ministre de la Justice et sous-procureur général du Canada, ministère de la Justice;

 

g)  Dale Yurka, avocate générale, Bureau régional de l’Ontario (Toronto), ministère de la Justice.
